MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: Color palette, sample color on the screen
English.Char_Desc_80: Make your own color palettes, sample and store colors you like.
English.Char_Desc_250: A tool for designers, web developers. Make your own color palettes. Sample colors from the screen, color model, and test colors before you use it. It is a tool for both designer and web developer.
English.Char_Desc_450: A tool for make color palettes. With Color Bee, you can collect and store colors you like for your projects. Color Bee provides you different ways of collecting colors, such as sampling a color from a color model, on the screen or palette libraries. It also offers you some simple methods to test colors you sample before using them.
English.Char_Desc_2000: With Color Bee, you can collect and store colors you like for your projects. Color Bee provides you different ways of collecting colors, such as sampling a color from a color model or on the screen. Before you get colors you sampled into usage, Color Bee also offers you several methods to test them by writing texts, simple drawing or pattern styles etc.. You can also export your palette to a bmp Image file, and sample colros from it in any painting program you use. Color Bee wish to inspire you, help you make the colors not just delight but personification.

But you should not charge or requesting donations for any such copies however made and from distributing the software and/or documentation with other products without the author's written permission.
